editor.onDetailsOverlaySubmit.update.lon:
The duration of selected media (!new_duration) is greater than the current one (!old_duration).
It will probably be necessary to resynchronize the pages and elements whose end time is equal to that of the current media.
Are you sure you want to use the new media file?
editor.onDetailsOverlaySubmit.update.nee:
The duration of selected media (!new_duration) is less than the current one (!old_duration).
Pages with a start time after !new_duration will therefore be out of reach. This applies to blocks: !blocks
Please delete those pages or modify their start time and try again.
editor.onDetailsOverlaySubmit.update.sho:
The duration of selected media (!new_duration) is less than the current one (!old_duration).
It will probably be necessary to resynchronize the pages and elements whose end time is greater than that of the selected media.
Are you sure you want to use the new media file?
